item.description:
Just call me or even walk to me. Either or I will be right there. I'll be there at 5:30pm

Everyone can be there at 5:50pm but I'll be there a half hour early.



I'll make like 4 copies only but "I Love You Man" will be uploaded in 'Files".



I LOVE YOU, MAN - Trailer


cell: 6174358177

Windsor

Assistant Organizer (Boston Movie Group)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs in line waiting for you to let me know you have arrived
item.name: I LOVE YOU, MAN - Advance Screening Movie
